title: Why have The Eagles’ music videos been removed from YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eagles. There is no “The.” Any copyright holder can select to allow their catalogue of work or individual works as available, or not, on platforms of their choice. They don't need a reason expressed or implied to make such a choice, and you generally won't be able to get an answer on these decisions from anyone from the entity that controls those decisions.
Nope, they’re still there. Maybe they’ve been removed from your country (Youtube removes BBC videos from Britain… it’s the first B, guys, calm down).
